name: Hoja
description: Simple markdown note taking application. Features markdown rendering and autosaving. Access your notes either on mobile or desktop!

name: Flixnet
description: Mock e-commerce site that lets you browse movies purchase them. Keep track of your orders and view your cart any time!

name: Archival
description: Online card collection organizer for Magic: The Gathering cards. Manage your personal card collection by digitizing it! See other user's collections too!
